mapping.name: ${province_en}_CAPACITYWARN_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.templet: 电信四期_容量瓶颈预警_LTE.ftl
mapping.sql: SELECT '1.42.01b_SP0' as "版本号",'%%Y-%%M-%%D' as 时间戳, C.PROVINCE_NAME "省份", C.CITY_NAME "地市", COUNT(1) AS "容量瓶颈预警数量", 1 AS "网元级别", 0 AS "系统类型", CASE B.ALARM_LEVEL WHEN 1 THEN 0 WHEN 2 THEN 1 WHEN 3 THEN 2 END AS "预警级别", (CASE B.VENDOR WHEN 'ZY0808' THEN '华为' WHEN 'ZY0810' THEN '阿朗' WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN '中兴' WHEN 'ZY0000' THEN '公共' END) AS "厂商", REPLACE(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT(C.PROVINCE_SHORT_ENNAME || '-' || C.CITY_SHORT_ENNAME || '-' || B.NE_BSC_ID)), ',', '|') AS "网元编号", REPLACE(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT B.BSC_NAME), ',', '|') AS "网元中文名称" FROM (SELECT ALARM_LEVEL,START_TIME, MODEL_ID, CITY_NAME, BSC_NAME, NE_BSC_ID, VENDOR, RN FROM (SELECT ALARM_LEVEL,START_TIME, MODEL_ID, CITY_NAME, BSC_NAME, NE_BSC_ID, VENDOR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CITY_ID ORDER BY BSC_ID) AS RN FROM MOD_RESOURCE_ANALYSIS_BSCBOARD) WHERE RN < 50) B INNER JOIN MOD_RESOURCE_TEMPLATE T ON B.MODEL_ID = T.MODEL_ID INNER JOIN CFG_PROVINCE_CITY C ON B.CITY_NAME = C.CITY_NAME WHERE T.BUSINESS_TYPE IN (0, 2) AND B.ALARM_LEVEL IN (1, 2, 3) AND (START_TIME >= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND START_TIME < to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD')+7) GROUP BY C.CITY_NAME, B.ALARM_LEVEL, B.VENDOR, C.PROVINCE_NAME UNION ALL SELECT '1.42.01b_SP0' as "版本号",'%%Y-%%M-%%D' as 时间戳, C.PROVINCE_NAME "省份", C.CITY_NAME "地市", COUNT(1) AS "容量瓶颈预警数量", 1 AS "网元级别", 1 AS "系统类型", CASE B.ALARM_LEVEL WHEN 1 THEN 0 WHEN 2 THEN 1 WHEN 3 THEN 2 END AS "预警级别", (CASE B.VENDOR WHEN 'ZY0808' THEN '华为' WHEN 'ZY0810' THEN '阿朗' WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN '中兴' WHEN 'ZY0000' THEN '公共' END) AS "厂商", REPLACE(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT(C.PROVINCE_SHORT_ENNAME || '-' || C.CITY_SHORT_ENNAME || '-' || B.NE_BSC_ID)), ',', '|') AS "网元编号", REPLACE(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT B.BSC_NAME), ',', '|') AS "网元中文名称" FROM (SELECT ALARM_LEVEL,START_TIME, MODEL_ID, CITY_NAME, BSC_NAME, NE_BSC_ID, VENDOR, RN FROM (SELECT ALARM_LEVEL,START_TIME, MODEL_ID, CITY_NAME, BSC_NAME, NE_BSC_ID, VENDOR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CITY_ID ORDER BY BSC_ID) AS RN FROM MOD_RESOURCE_ANALYSIS_BSCBOARD) WHERE RN < 50) B INNER JOIN MOD_RESOURCE_TEMPLATE T ON B.MODEL_ID = T.MODEL_ID INNER JOIN CFG_PROVINCE_CITY C ON B.CITY_NAME = C.CITY_NAME WHERE T.BUSINESS_TYPE IN (1, 2) AND B.ALARM_LEVEL IN (1, 2, 3) AND (START_TIME >= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND START_TIME < to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD')+7) GROUP BY C.CITY_NAME, B.ALARM_LEVEL, B.VENDOR, C.PROVINCE_NAME UNION ALL SELECT '1.42.01b_SP0' as "版本号",'%%Y-%%M-%%D' as 时间戳, C.PROVINCE_NAME "省份", C.CITY_NAME "地市", COUNT(1) AS "容量瓶颈预警数量", 0 AS "网元级别", 0 AS "系统类型", CASE B.ALARM_LEVEL WHEN 1 THEN 0 WHEN 2 THEN 1 WHEN 3 THEN 2 END AS "预警级别", (CASE B.VENDOR WHEN 'ZY0808' THEN '华为' WHEN 'ZY0810' THEN '阿朗' WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN '中兴' WHEN 'ZY0000' THEN '公共' END) AS "厂商", REPLACE(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT(C.PROVINCE_SHORT_ENNAME || '-' || C.CITY_SHORT_ENNAME || '-' || B.NE_BTS_ID)), ',', '|') AS "网元编号", REPLACE(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT B.BTS_NAME), ',', '|') AS "网元中文名称" FROM (SELECT ALARM_LEVEL,START_TIME, MODEL_ID, CITY_NAME, BTS_NAME, NE_BTS_ID, VENDOR, RN FROM (SELECT ALARM_LEVEL,START_TIME, MODEL_ID, CITY_NAME, BTS_NAME, NE_BTS_ID, VENDOR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CITY_ID ORDER BY BTS_ID) AS RN FROM MOD_RESOURCE_ANALYSIS_BTSBOARD) WHERE RN < 50) B INNER JOIN MOD_RESOURCE_TEMPLATE T ON B.MODEL_ID = T.MODEL_ID INNER JOIN CFG_PROVINCE_CITY C ON B.CITY_NAME = C.CITY_NAME WHERE T.BUSINESS_TYPE IN (0, 2) AND B.ALARM_LEVEL IN (1, 2, 3) AND (START_TIME >= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND START_TIME < to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD')+7) GROUP BY C.CITY_NAME, B.ALARM_LEVEL, B.VENDOR, C.PROVINCE_NAME UNION ALL SELECT '1.42.01b_SP0' as "版本号",'%%Y-%%M-%%D' as 时间戳, C.PROVINCE_NAME "省份", C.CITY_NAME "地市", COUNT(1) AS "容量瓶颈预警数量", 0 AS "网元级别", 1 AS "系统类型", CASE B.ALARM_LEVEL WHEN 1 THEN 0 WHEN 2 THEN 1 WHEN 3 THEN 2 END AS "预警级别", (CASE B.VENDOR WHEN 'ZY0808' THEN '华为' WHEN 'ZY0810' THEN '阿朗' WHEN 'ZY0804' THEN '中兴' WHEN 'ZY0000' THEN '公共' END) AS "厂商", REPLACE(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT(C.PROVINCE_SHORT_ENNAME || '-' || C.CITY_SHORT_ENNAME || '-' || B.NE_BTS_ID)), ',', '|') AS "网元编号", REPLACE(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(DISTINCT B.BTS_NAME), ',', '|') AS "网元中文名称" FROM (SELECT ALARM_LEVEL,START_TIME, MODEL_ID, CITY_NAME, BTS_NAME, NE_BTS_ID, VENDOR, RN FROM (SELECT ALARM_LEVEL,START_TIME, MODEL_ID, CITY_NAME, BTS_NAME, NE_BTS_ID, VENDOR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CITY_ID ORDER BY BTS_ID) AS RN FROM MOD_RESOURCE_ANALYSIS_BTSBOARD) WHERE RN < 50) B INNER JOIN MOD_RESOURCE_TEMPLATE T ON B.MODEL_ID = T.MODEL_ID INNER JOIN CFG_PROVINCE_CITY C ON B.CITY_NAME = C.CITY_NAME WHERE T.BUSINESS_TYPE IN (1, 2) AND B.ALARM_LEVEL IN (1, 2, 3) AND (START_TIME >= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD') AND START_TIME < to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D','YYYY-MM-DD')+7) GROUP BY C.CITY_NAME, B.ALARM_LEVEL, B.VENDOR, C.PROVINCE_NAME
